channel.title: NYT > Technology
channel.description: Technology industry news, commentary, and analysis, with reporting on big tech, startups, and internet culture. The New York Times is a hub for conversation about news and ideas.

item.title: Solvay of Belgium Creates Rare Earths Deals With U.S.
item.description: The contracts are the latest sign of how Europe is lagging the United States in the race to break China’s chokehold on rare earths.
item.dc:creator: Liz Alderman

media:content.media:credit: Dmitry Kostyukov for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Solvay’s rare earths processing plant in La Rochelle, France. The company signed two deals to send rare earths to the United States.
